spaceinvaders.server.network

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceinvaders.server.network.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>, Service<java.lang.Void>

    public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service<java.lang.Void>
    Handles the connection with a client.

                  java.util.concurrent.TransferQueue<java.net.DatagramPacket> outgoingPacketQueue)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        socket - an already opened TCP socket.
        outgoingPacketQueue - used for sending UDP packets.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the socket is not connected or an exception occurs when opening the I/O streams.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if an argument is null.

        public void unwrapPacket(java.net.DatagramPacket packet)

        Throws:

      • send

        public void send(Command command)
        Send a command to the client.

        Commands are not actually send over the network until flush is called.

        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if argument is null.

      • readCommands

        Returns:

      • setUdpChain

        public void setUdpChain(int port)
        Add an UDP sender to the chain.
        Parameters:
        port - the port of the remote client, where UDP packets should be sent.
